channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Garbage on street, 1st February
item.description:
Some days it blocks the path and people need to walk in the road of through the patch of mud next to it. It has been there for at least 2 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Laburnum Way, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The street is y being swept!!!, 1st February
item.description:
Street cleaners are simply not cleaning the street Used to be regular now street hasn’t been swept in 3 weeks again Then complained and a team of street cleaners came and were gone in a few hrs Is there a regukar street cleaning service ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21-28, White's Square, Clapham, Greater London

item.title: Mapesbury Road before joining Shoot up Hill. Positioned on left hand side of road. Dangerous pothole on side of speed bump., 1st February
item.description:
As above pothole is on left hand side of road just before you come to Shoot up Hill. It is positioned on side of speed bump therefore you cannot avoid especially if oncoming traffic. Was reported a year or two ago.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 xl bullys pooping owner not cleaning the mess, 1st February
item.description:
The young man and i assume his girlfriend where walking 2 xl bullys one of the dogs pooped outside the school gates. The owner didnt clean it. Carried on walking like this poo mess his dog left behind is okay. Children go to the school and will be stepping
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seal Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous use of an electric motor bike, 1st February
item.description:
The child or young person at 91 Guibal Road (SE12) has or uses an electric motor bike (not an e-bike) and the use is a public nuisance. Today I saw him ride out with no helmet, using a mobile phone and only wearing sliders. It is only a matter of time before there is an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 101, Guibal Road, Chinbrook, Grove Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop Eltham Park Gardens towards Welling : timetable panel door missing and backplate hinges look broken, 1st February
item.description:
Bus stop Eltham Park Gardens towards Welling : timetable panel door missing and backplate hinges look broken See photographs Needs new door and the important missing B16 timetable added Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmount Road, Well Hall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People never indicate, 1st February
item.description:
More than half of cars do not indicate when turning off Royal Circus onto Pyrmont Grove, even when I am crossing with a baby. I think they do not realise it is a different road for some reason. I would suggest making the road markings clearer, or putting up signage of some sort.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pyrmont Grove, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
